message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_CLIENT_ALREADY_PLACED_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: This client is already placed with another provider for the same case and service for the same or overlapping period, the placement cannot be created.

message.name: INF_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_CLIENT_IS_WAITLISTED_FOR_PROVIDER_OR_PROVIDER_OFFERING
message.locale: This client is wait listed with a status of 'Open' with other providers or provider offerings for the same case.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_PLACE_NOT_AVAILABLE_FROM_DATETIME
message.locale: The place is not available for the period from %1z.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_ENTRY_XRV_PLACE_NOT_AVAILABLE_FROM_DATETIME_TO_DATETIME
message.locale: The place is not available for the period from %1z to %2z.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_XRV_PLACE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_WAITLIST_CANNOT_BE_ALLOCATED
message.locale: Place is not 'Available', reservation cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_START_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Expiration From Date should be entered if Expiration To Date is entered.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_SERACH_CRITERIA_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_WAITLIST_XRV_CLIENT_ALREADY_WAIT_LISTED_FOR_FUND_FISCAL_YEAR_CANNOT_BE_WAIT_LISTED_AGAIN
message.locale: The client has already been wait listed for this obligation for the fund fiscal year.
